stem: For a long extension cord feeding a сварочного источника, which practice is best?

choices.text: Использовать the smallest gauge to save weight
Use a larger (heavier) gauge to minimize падения напряжения
Coil the cord tightly for neatness
Run multiple lightweight cords in series

rationales.B: Long runs need heavier‑gauge cords to limit падения напряжения and heating.
